name: phpstan-vscode
description: PHPStan language server and inline error provider

phpstan.binCommand.description: PHPStan command. Use this instead of "binPath" if, for example, the phpstan binary is in your path

phpstan.configFile.description: Path to the config file (leave empty to disable)

phpstan.paths.description: Path mapping for scanned files. Allows for rewriting paths for for example SSH or Docker.

phpstan.options.description: Extra commandline options to be passed to PHPStan

phpstan.enableStatusBar.description: Show the status bar while scanning

enumDescriptions: Run on content change (while you type)

phpstan.timeout.description: Timeout in milliseconds. After this time the checking process is canceled

phpstan.suppressTimeoutMessage.description: Stop showing an error when the operation times out

commands.title: PHPStan: Scan current file for errors

scripts.prepack: yarn generate-package && yarn prettier --check client server && yarn lint && yarn compile && yarn run build
scripts.build:main: yarn --cwd server build:debug && yarn --cwd client build:debug
scripts.build:debug:main: yarn --cwd server build:debug && yarn --cwd client build:debug
scripts.format-staged: (git diff --ignore-submodules --quiet && yarn format) || pretty-quick client server
scripts.package: yarn run prepack && yarn vsce package
scripts.package-dev: yarn prepush && yarn run build:debug && yarn vsce package
scripts.generate-package: generate-package-json generate --input shared/commands/defs.ts -w -p package.json --handler client/src/lib/commands.ts --validate --prefix PHPStan && prettier --write package.json
scripts.prepush: yarn generate-package && yarn format-staged && yarn lint --fix && yarn compile
scripts.dev: yarn && yarn --cwd client && yarn --cwd server && cd test/demo && composer install && cd ../../php && composer install && cd vendor/phpstan && git clone https://github.com/phpstan/phpstan-src
